mapper.select: select * from(select rownum rn, tt.*from (select * from blogboardtable where step=0 order by blogboardtable_seq desc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
mapper.insert: insert into blogboardtable(blogboardtable_seq, nickname ,email, subject, content, mainimage, logtime, publicoption) values(blogboardtable_seq.nextval, #{nickname },#{email }, #{subject }, #{content},#{backgroundImg } ,sysdate,#{publicoption })
mapper.delete: delete blogboardtable where blogboardtable_seq=#{seq} or pseq=#{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into blogboardtable(blogboardtable_seq, nickname,email, content, logtime, ref, step, pseq) values(blogboardtable_seq.nextval, #{nickname },#{email }, #{content}, sysdate, #{ref}, #{step}, #{pseq})
mapper.select: select * from blogboardtable where ref=#{ref} and step!=0 order by step, blogboardtable_seq
mapper.update: update blogboardtable set content = #{content}, logtime = sysdate where blogboardtable_seq = #{seq}
